text: Mia accidentally tripped while coming down the stairs. How did she feel?
Dan has colorful birthday gifts piled on the table. How do you think Dan feels?
While playing, Liz froze when she noticed a spider dangling from the ceiling. How do you think Liz feels ?
Alex ate chips before dinner even when his mom told him not to. How will his mom feel ?
An ice cream cone slipped  from Anna’s hand and fell on the sidewalk. How do you think she feels ?
Ron woke up from a bad dream. What do you think he is feeling?
Sam’s brother insisted on playing one more game. Now he gets a timeout for exceeding his screen time. How do you think Sam feels?
Li plays at the arcade with his cousins.
